alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 9:01PM CDT until April 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Copiah and Simpson Counties. Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. For the Lower Pearl River ...including D`lo, Rockport, Monticello, Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Monticello. * WHEN...From Monday morning to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Water inundates some lowland and agricultural land near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 21.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 22.5 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Monticello 22.0 21.3 Sun 8 pm CDT 22.3 22.5 22.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 900 AM CDT.
